remark.ch: 建議先修過高等微積及大學部機率論

goal.en: In real world, because of uncertainty, probability is used to describe variety of phenomena. If models are involved in time, we call them stochastic processes. Examples are Markov chains, random walks, renewal processes and so on. Each topic above can be taught for 1 semester. In this course, we plan to make an introduction to them. Proofs will be explained to some extent, if not all the detail. Emphasis is put on the motivations and applications. Students are required to do some homework. Moreover, students are supposed to know how to derive easy results by computing or applying theorems.
goal.ch: 由於各種不確定的因素，而有機率論來描素並處理此類現象。如果描素的現象與時並行，就被稱為隨機過程。例如馬氏過程，更新理論，分支過程，隨機漫步等。課程中，所有定理會給予證明，但也許不會給出完整的證明。重點在於動機及應用。希望修課的同學能夠掌握這些過程的基本知識。包含簡單證明及計算。

content.en: We will cover Markov Chains, Renewal Theory, Branching Processes and, if time allowed, Poisson Process.
content.ch: 馬氏過程，更新理論，分支過程，隨機漫步等。如果時間允許，Poisson 過程。
